players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I suspect Bob might be the mafia because he was quiet."
You: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. Diana was killed by him. I vote to arrest Bob. Charlie, thanks for your suspicion."
Bob: "I think Alice might be wrong. I didn't kill Diana, I was out of town."
Charlie: "Alice, thanks. Bob, you said you were out of town but Alice found you mafia. Either you lied or Alice lied. I think you’re mafia."
Bob: "Alice's investigation was likely misinterpreted; maybe she misheard my role. Charlie, I was out of town, you saw me elsewhere. I am innocent."
You: "Bob, you are the mafia. I investigated you and confirmed. You killed Diana. Your alibi is false. Vote to arrest."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
